data.Title: Google Discover Offers No Content Blocking Options
data.Description: Google confirms no option to block content from Discover, unlike News, highlighting limitations in crawling control.

data.Title: Google Renders All Pages, Including JavaScript-Heavy Sites
data.Description: Google renders all webpages, including JavaScript-heavy sites, for search indexing.

data.Title: Bing's Index: Crucial for the Future of SEO
data.Description: Bing's index is becoming increasingly important for SEO as it now powers ChatGPT, Meta AI, LinkedIn AI, and Microsoft Copilot.

data.Title: Google's Disavow Tool: Should You Use It?
data.Description: There's one possible reason to disavow inbound links in circa 2024.

data.Title: Google's Privacy Sandbox Outage Raises Contractual Concerns
data.Description: Google's Privacy Sandbox outage sparks contractual concerns since its terms of service leave users footing the bill even when it doesn't work.

data.Title: Schema.org Gets a Design Refresh
data.Description: Schema.org has a new design, it seems like the design went live this week. The Schema.org validator also looks fresh and new.

data.Title: Google to Increase Engagement with Content Creators
data.Description: Google is increasing its engagement with content creators, with recent meetings and plans for more in the future.

data.Title: The Rise of Longer Videos on YouTube
data.Description: Short-form videos may have surged in popularity over the past several years, but the long-form video format is on the comeback trail.

data.Title: The Challenges of Working with Founder-Influencers
data.Description: A DTC investor shares insights on the difficulties of navigating the relationship with founder-influencers.

data.Title: Retail Media: A Full-Funnel Play for Media Agencies
data.Description: Media agencies are increasingly leveraging retail media as a full-funnel marketing solution.

data.Title: Navigating Data Security, Stability, and Fairness in the Age of AI
data.Description: Agencies are grappling with the challenges of data security, stability, and fairness as AI tools become increasingly prevalent.

data.Title: OpenAI's 'Strawberry' Project Aims to Enhance AI Reasoning
data.Description: OpenAI is developing 'Strawberry,' a project focused on improving the reasoning capabilities of AI models.

data.Title: COPIED Act: Protecting Artists and Journalists from AI Content Use
data.Description: The COPIED Act seeks to safeguard the content of artists and journalists from unauthorized use by AI systems.
